metadata.title: CVE-2022-42330 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Guests can cause Xenstore crash via soft reset When a guest issues a "SoftReset" (e.g. for performing a kexec) the libxl based Xen toolstack willnormally perform a XS_RELEASE Xenstore operation. Due to a bug in xenstoredthis can result in a crash of xenstored. Any other use of XS_RELEASE willhave the same impact.

criterions.comment: xen package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
